mapper.sql: t_dev_develop . id , t_dev_develop.title, t_dev_develop.description, t_dev_develop.query_file_name AS queryFileName, t_dev_develop.execution_file_name AS executionFileName, t_dev_develop.param_status AS paramStatus, t_dev_develop.sql_version AS sqlVersion, t_dev_develop.note, t_dev_develop.create_time AS createTime, t_dev_develop.update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT t_dev_develop.* FROM t_dev_develop WHERE t_dev_develop.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_dev_develop.id

SELECT
FROM t_dev_develop
WHERE 1=1
AND t_dev_develop.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.title},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.description},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.query_file_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.queryFileName},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.execution_file_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.executionFileName},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.status = #{record.status}
AND t_dev_develop.sort_number = #{record.sortNumber}
AND t_dev_develop.param_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paramStatus},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.param_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paramStatus},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.sql_version LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.sqlVersion},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND t_dev_develop.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_dev_develop.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY t_dev_develop.sort_number DESC,t_dev_develop.update_time DESC , t_dev_develop.create_time DESC
